metadata.dc:author: Castillo Higueras, P
Martínez Salmerón, J F
Gutiérrez-Rave Pecero, V
Franco Cebrián, J
Ogea García, J L
Uariachi, M
metadata.dc:description: We report the case of a female patient that fulfills major criteria of Behcet's disease. Multiple esophageal aphthous ulcers seen by endoscopy responded to therapy with steroids and colchicine.
metadata.dc:title: Afectación esofágica en la enfermedad de Behcet.
[Esophageal involvement in Behçet's disease].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
